haemophilus influenzae prophylaxis: diphtheria toxoid / hepatitis b pediatric vaccine / pertussis, acellular / poliovirus vaccine, inactivated / tetanus toxoid
haemophilus b conjugate (prp-t) vaccine / meningococcal conjugate vaccine
diphtheria toxoid / haemophilus b conjugate (prp-t) vaccine / pertussis, acellular / poliovirus vaccine, inactivated / tetanus toxoid

Common side effects: pain, swelling, or redness where the shot was given.
